body.name: Blackview Shark8 Unlocked Phones, 16GB+256GB/SD 2TB Android Phones, MTK G99, 120Hz 6.78" FHD+, 33W Fast Charge 5000mAh, Android 13 Mobile Phone, 64MP Camera, NFC/Fingerprint/198g, T-Mobile Cellphone
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 13 hrs 59 mins
features: 🚀【Octa-Core Helio G99 6nm Processor & 16GB+256GB/2TB Expand】🚀 Blackview Shark8 android phones feature an Octa-core 6nm MediaTek Helio G99 6nm Processor, ensuring superior performance, faster fluidity, and reduced power consumption. Enjoy optimal gaming and image processing. The 8GB RAM+256GB ROM storage expands to 16GB RAM (with 8GB virtual memory). With 256GB ROM expandable to 2TB, you can store more media. The dedicated Micro SD slot supports up to 2TB of external storage.

📲【120Hz 6.78-inch Large Screen & Smart-K Box Speaker】📲 Blackview SHARK 8 smart phone features a 6.78-inch 2.4K display, offering over 90% screen usage and a smooth 120 Hz refresh rate (1080 x 2460), providing a more comfortable viewing experience. High-fidelity colors, clear images, and Smart-K box speaker technology make movies and games more exciting. Enjoy full viewing angles, 10-point touch technology, and a bright display of up to 500 nits for happy moments anytime.

🌟【Ultra-Slim Body, Only 8.35mm & 198g Weight】🌟 The Blackview SHARK8 unlocked smartphones stands out with its ultra-light and thin design, boasting a mere 8.35mm thickness and a weight of 198g. This sleek and lightweight body is crafted using cutting-edge CNC technology and advanced electroplating methods, ensuring a premium feel and stunning aesthetics, making it a pleasure to hold. Whether it's the portability, aesthetic finesse, or the overall user experience, the Blackview SHARK8 unlocked phones truly excels, making it a compelling choice for you.

✅【The Latest Android 13 & Doke OS 4.0 System】✅ The SHARK 8 android phones come equipped with the latest Android 13 operating system, enhancing privacy and personalization for a seamless work and play experience. This Android 13 android phones offers per-app language preferences, a data migration assistant, cleared clipboard history, and notification permissions. There's more! With the integration of Doke OS 4.0, enjoy additional functionalities like call recording and exercise index tracking. Additionally, explore easy sharing, real-time subtitles, and more exciting features and optimizations!

📷【64MP ArcSoft Camera & Smart ISO & Multiple Photo Modes】📷 Capture stunning images with the VGA camera, featuring a maximum resolution of 64MP. This cellphone also supports Smart ISO, delivering ultra-high resolution, high speed, and optimal color reproduction. In changing light, the ISOCELL GW3 sensor of SHARK 8 auto-adjusts its pixels, and Tetrapixel technology boosts low-light photos, helping users shoot like a pro. Experience 360° Panorama Capture, 2K 30fps Video Recording with Beauty Mode, Night Mode, HDR, and more to stimulate your creativity in photography. The 13MP front camera, combined with a beauty selfie mode, captures ultra-sharp and bright photos.

🔋【5000mAh Battery & 33W Fast Charge】🔋 Go from dawn to dusk and beyond with the SHARK 8's 5000mAh mega battery. You're back in the game in no time with 33W Fast Charging. Enjoy all-day worry-free use with up to 7 hours of continuous video or up to 29 hours of music playback. Additionally, an improved smart battery system maximizes energy efficiency based on your needs and reduces battery loss by 15%. Furthermore, SHARK 8 unlocked phones can also be used as a power bank to charge other devices through the USB OTG function.

💖【2 Years Warranty Service + Multi-Function】💖 Our shop guarantees all Blackview phones for 2 years. Should any issues arise, reach out to us for prompt assistance. Support Fingerprint & Face ID Unlock. This 4G dual sim phone features 3 card slots accommodating 2 nano SIM cards + 1 micro SD/TF card (SIM/SD not included). It also adds NFC (Google Pay) functions, allowing you to use SHARK 8 NFC for quick payments and money transfers. Benefit from GPS, Beidou, GLONASS, and Galileo navigation.

📶【Please Read Before Purchasing】📶 Blackview Shark8 unlocked smartphones support 4G network, compatible with GSM carriers like T-mobile, Speedtalk, Mint Mobile, BTC, MetroPCS, H2O, Movistar, Telcel, Tigo, Claro, Ultra Mobile, Tello, Bell Wireless, Rogers Wireless, Chatr, Telus, Fido, FIZZ, and more. (❌Not compatible with CDMA carriers such as AT&T, Cricket Wireless, Verizon, Straight Talk or U.S.Cellular) 🔔🔔Support Network: 4G FDD: B2/B3/B4/B5/B7/B12/B13/B17/B26/B66; 3G WCDMA: B2/B4/B5 ; 2G GSM: 850/900/1800/1900.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Blackview SHARK 8 --- 2024 New 120Hz Display Unlocked Android Phones

reviews.reviewText: Lo Shark 8 è un ottimo cellulare.Con i suoi 256 giga di memoria intera, ed espandendo con una micro SD diventa un mini computer.Il suo mega display si vede anche in angolazioni estreme, inoltre le App preinstallatenon hanno pubblicità.La possibilità di registrare le conversazioni;molto sensibile al tocco per l'accensione con impronta digitale;fluido e veloce nello scorrere le pagine. Anche senza custodia protettiva (in dotazione), non lascia impronte e non scivola dalla mano.È già dotato di una pellicola protettiva, ma nella confezione è inclusa anche una protezione aggiuntiva anti graffi, caduta accidentale.La batteria è ottima, e con la suaricarica veloce di 33W ti consente di non avere sorprese:tempo 15' per il 100%!Per la lettura o la notte ha due funzioni per riposare la vista e non affaticarla.Personalmente lascio sempre"modalità lettura" anche di giorno,si vede bene 👍.Lo ritengo un buon telefono, considerando la buona qualità e in rapporto al prezzo molto basso e competitivo.Lo consiglio a tutti.La mia valutazione è dicinque ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Stelle.Senza dimenticarmi del corriere Amazon, sempre preciso, professionale e rispettoso 👍.

Sorprendida con mi nueva adquisición, buscaba algo barato y que tuviera unas prestaciones un poco decentes.Sin duda ha superado mis expectativas, con 8 GB de RAM ampliables y 256 GB de ROM da para todas las app que quieras.Va muy fluido y la calidad de imagen es genial, me frenaba el precio pues es demasiado barato para las características que dispone, cualquier otra marca duplicaría su precio.No tengo pegas, la cámara hace unas fotos geniales y además viene con un protector de cristal templado para la pantalla y una funda de silicona de bastante calidad, que más se puede pedir.La línea de los bordes son rectos, lo cual están a la última.Batería de 5000 mlhp que dura más de un día.Nfc para las compras y Jack 3,5 que valoro mucho pues puedes usar los auriculares con cable también.Tiene las tres B, bueno, bonito y barato.Lo que menos me gusta es el sensor de huella en el botón de encendido, aunque sea mejor yo lo prefiero en la pantalla.

Ich war immer schon ein großer Anhänger von Low Budget Smartphon und habe die verschiedensten Marken und Entwicklungen getestet, aber das Blackview Shark8 ist der Hammer. Habe es seit ein paar Tagen in Gebrauch, große Speicherkapazität, schnell und vor allem flüssig 120 Hz ohne zu ruckeln, helles FHD Display, NFC an Bord. Vor allem brauchbare Fotos, tolle Einstellmöglichkeiten wer es braucht, saubere Verarbeitung Schutzfolie Display und Rückseite vorhanden, verstehe sowieso nicht, warum man überhöhte Preise bezahlt, wenn es in dem Bereich mittlerweile auch sehr gute Geräte gibt, meine erstes Blackview und nicht das letzte. Preis Leistung unschlagbar. Android 13 finde ich etwas überladen, ansonsten alles ok.

Il cellulare tutto sommato non è male il rapporto qualità prezzo è ottimo però la descrizione non vera il telefono ha 8 ram e non 16 come indicato non lo restituisco solo perché mi serve. Non va bene scrivere caratteristiche non vere

Estoy encantado con mi nuevo teléfono, tube otro de esta misma marca...y e acertado.. Ya que son muy resistentes... Tiene buena a calidad de imagen y sonido... Hace muy buenas fotos... La bateria se carga enseguida y le dura bastante.... El precio genial.. N me parece nada caro.Contento.
